name: A step into fairytale storybook
description:
Created an illusion between 2D and 3D ‘A step into fairytale storybook’ is an application where users are free to explore 10 rooms which depicts various of well loved children fairytales and stories.

Music credit goes to Paul Frazer, 'Contemplation' 

* This was part of my Dimension class, at Parson Paris.
